text: appeal addehattinre janatayile satyanisedhikalaya pramanimar parannu: "iyal ninnaleppealulla oru manusyan matraman. ninnalekkal valuppam netan neakkukayan ivan. satyattil daivam icchiccirunnenkil avan malakkukale irakkittarumayirunnu. nannalute purvapitakkalkkitayileannum innaneyeann nannal kettitteyilla
